text: Like a Prayer was the fourth studio album by singer Madonna. Songs from the album include the title track, "Cherish" and "Express Yourself". The album was #1 on the Billboard 200 for just over a month. The album was released on March 21, 1989 by Sire Records. Category:Madonna albums Category:1989 albums Category:Pop albums Category:Gospel albums Category:Rock albums
title: Like a Prayer
